column1: #text=Last week , I decided to take a nice relaxing bubble bath after a hard day of work .
#text=After getting done with my chores , I went up stairs into the bedroom to grab some clothes .
#text=After finding on what I wanted to wear , I went into the bathroom and shut the door .
#text=I went to the bath tub , and turned on the faucet .
#text=I messed around with the knobs on the faucet to get some hot water that was perfect temperature .
#text=After I found the perfect temperature I then plug the drain and then put a small amount of bubble bath into the tub .
#text=While I am waiting for the water to raise , I take off my clothes and put them into the laundry basket .
#text=After the water is at an acceptable level , I turn off the faucet completely .
#text=I then turn some music on , and sit down in the tub and relax for a while .
#text=I get a washcloth and clean myself up everywhere .
#text=After I am done I then get up and dry myself off with a towel and drain the water .
#text=After I am dried I put my new clothes on and clean up the bathroom .
